type: SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT FOR REMOTELY PILOTED AIRCRAFT SYSTEM (RPAS)
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The government of Canada wishes to establish a supply arrangement for remote-piloted aircraft systems (RPAS) of various capabilities.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) wishes to establish Supply Arrangements (SA) for the domestic requirements of Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS) services of various capabilities across Canada, ",as and when requested" by participating Federal Government Departments and Agencies or Crown Corporations, herein referred to as ",Identified Users".
duration_in_months: We will be taking until 2026-03-31 to decide this contract.
full_summary:
## SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT FOR REMOTELY PILOTED AIRCRAFT SYSTEM (RPAS)

### Request for Supply Arrangement

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites tenders for Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS) service supply arrangements to meet the domestic requirements of various departments and agencies across Canada.

### Notice Details

*   **Tender Reference**: WS4441190652
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4441190652
*   **Publication Date**: February 13, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2:00 PM on March 27, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

### Overview

The purpose of this Request for Supply Arrangement is to establish domestic supply arrangements for RPAS services of various capabilities in Canada. The supplies are to be provided as and when requested by identified federal government departments, agencies or Crown Corporations.

### Essential Requirements

*   RPAS services of various capabilities across Canada
*   Domestic supply arrangement to meet occasional requirements of participating departments and agencies

### Methods of Submission

Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Ariba platform.

### Contact Information

*   **Name**: Anita Laure Segla, PSPC/SPAC
*   **Email**: [anitalaure.segla@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:anitalaure.segla@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL

The complete tender notice can be viewed on the Ariba platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18775133](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18775133)
